exclusion.criterion: history of seizures unrelated to drug withdrawal
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: have a sibling or parent with epilepsy
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: disorganized thought process or intellectual impairment that inhibits the ability to give an informed consent
exclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has a history of epilepsy, CHF, and depression. He has been seizure-free for 20 years but was recently tapered off Dilantin.
